Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: In relation to sex offender's notice of residency requirements
Summary: Relates to sex offender's notice of residency requirements; provides that no sex offender shall reside in a residence within 1000 feet of any school building regularly used for instructional purposes, a building in which child day care is provided or a park.
LawCode: Amd ยง168-b, Cor L; amd ยง259-c, Exec L; amd ยง65.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to sex offender's notice of residency requirements
